creator: Henry, Alexander elder, 1739-1824. (author)
Bell, Charles Napier, 1854-1936. (editor)
description: Henry, Alexander elder: 1739-1824. Born in New Jersey; in fur trade in Canada, 1763-1780; at Cumberland House, 1775-1776; settled in Montreal, 1781; uncle of the younger Alexander Henry (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Bell, Charles Napier: 1854-1936. From Ontario to Fort Garry as member of Wolseley expedition, fall 1870; after a year in Customs Department made hunting expedition in upper Saskatchewan region, summer 1872; customs clerk, 1874-1881; customs clerk with CPR, 1881-1886; secretary of Winnipeg Grain Exchange, 1887-1916; secretary-treasurer and later treasurer of Winnipeg Board of Trade, 1887-1919; active member of Historical and Scientific Society of Manitoba and other scientific societies (Winnipeg Free Press, August 3, 1936).
subject: Explorers, Surveyors and Travellers--Exploration
